headlines.title: Jupiter and its moons like never seen before: NASA unveils new images from the James Webb Telescope
headlines.description: Fans of the biggest planet in our solar system will be dazzled by the latest images taken by the Webb Telescope: Jupiter with its rings and three of its moons are shown in unprecedented detail.
headlines.content:
Astronomers are calling it the “dawn of a new era”: NASA revealed this week the first full-colour images and data from the James Webb Space Telescope, the world’s largest, most powerful and most complex space science telescope ever built.
The first r... [2681 chars]

headlines.title: UK heatwave: Met Office issues first ever red heat warning
headlines.description: There is a 'very likely' risk to life, with 'substantial changes' needed to people's daily routines early next week
headlines.content:
The Met Office has issued the first ever red alert for hot weather, warning there is a "very likely" risk to life.
Grahame Madge, Met Office spokesman, said: "We've just issued a red warning for extreme heat for Monday and Tuesday which is the first ... [474 chars]

headlines.title: Rohman Shawl reacts to ex-girlfriend Sushmita Sen and Lalit Modi’s relationship
headlines.description: Rohman Shawl, Sushmita Sen's ex-boyfriend, has shared his thoughts on the actor dating Lalit Modi. Rohman's reaction comes hours after Lalit shared his and Sushmita's pictures and called her his ‘better half’.
headlines.content: Only hours after Lalit Modi tweeted their photos together and called Sushmita Sen his ‘better half’, the former Miss Universe and actor’s ex-boyfriend Rohman Shawl responded to the news of their relationship. Calling love beautiful, Rohman said peopl... [1517 chars]

headlines.title: 1.2 billion-year-old groundwater is some of the oldest on Earth
headlines.description: Researchers discovered 1.2 billion-year-old groundwater inside a mine in South Africa.
headlines.content: Groundwater that was recently discovered deep underground in a mine in South Africa is estimated to be 1.2 billion years old. Researchers suspect that the groundwater is some of the oldest on the planet, and its chemical interactions with the surroun... [4610 chars]

headlines.title: Hairy Biker Dave Myers says cancer treatment is working but has caused 'sore eyes' and loss of taste
headlines.description: Hairy Biker Dave Myers has revealed for the first time that the chemotherapy treating his cancer is working.
headlines.content:
Hairy Biker Dave Myers has revealed for the first time that the chemotherapy treating his cancer is working.
The TV chef, 64, who went public with his cancer diagnosis in May, says his treatment has left him with 'sore eyes' because his lashes have f... [3060 chars]

headlines.title: Haim review - megawatt brightness from pop’s wisecracking charmers
headlines.description: The California sisters work the crowd like seasoned standups as they deliver gleeful catharsis with their bittersweet hits
headlines.content: Haim are a little late on stage but when middle sister Danielle strolls out in the usual uniform of bikini top and leather trousers to begin the riff of Now I’m in It, nobody in Glasgow appears peeved. After all, they’ve waited three pandemic resched... [2178 chars]

headlines.title: AMD Ryzen 5 7600X 6 Core & 4.4 GHz "Zen 4" Desktop CPU Spotted Running On Gigabyte's X670E AORUS Master Motherboard, Up To 11% Faster Than Ryzen 9 5950X
headlines.description: An AMD Ryzen 7000 CPU, most likely the Ryzen 5 7600X, has appeared within the Basemark benchmark with 6 Zen 4 cores.
headlines.content:
An AMD Ryzen 7000 CPU, most likely the Ryzen 5 7600X, has appeared within the Basemark benchmark with 6 Zen 4 cores.
AMD's Mid-Range Ryzen 5 7600X "Zen 4" CPU Spotted In Benchmark: Features 6 Cores, 12 Threads & 4.4 GHz ES Clock Speeds, Up To 11% Fas... [2475 chars]

headlines.title: WhatsApp to soon let users add voice note as ‘Status’
headlines.description: WhatsApp is currently testing the ‘Voice Status’ feature
headlines.content:
WhatsApp is expected to tease a new feature that will enable users to upload voice notes as a status. The new feature will be in addition to already available features such as photos, links and GIFs.
WhatsApp launched the ‘Status’ update in 2017, fol... [978 chars]

headlines.title: Dengue: 31 patients hospitalized in 24hrs
headlines.description: As many as 186 dengue patients, including 145 in the capital, are undergoing treatment
headlines.content:
Thirty-one more dengue patients were hospitalized in 24 hours till Friday morning amid a rise in the mosquito-borne disease in Bangladesh, according to the Directorate General of Health Services (DGHS).
Among them, 30 patients were hospitalized in Dh... [1875 chars]

headlines.title: Vivek Agnihotri: 'As long as Bollywood has Kings, Badshahs, Sultans, it'll sink'
headlines.description: Vivek Agnihotri has tweeted about Bollywood's downfall. Without taking names, the director has reacted to an article about Shah Rukh Khan.
headlines.content: Filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri took to his Twitter account recently to blame ‘Kings, Badhshahs, Sultans’ for the downfall of Bollywood. Without taking names, he reacted to a news article about Shah Rukh Khan and wrote, “As long as Bollywood has Kings, Bad... [1498 chars]
